title: Probability Rules
text: To find the probability of this situation, we need to first figure out how many total people are in our situation, then we must figure out the total number of people that "could" be in our situation (Occurences vs Total Events).

title: Number in Situation
text: What is the number of Saxophonists who play during the day?

title: Probability Rules
text: Now that we have the total number of people who are already in our situation, we just need to find out the total number of people who "could" be in our situation.

title: Number of People
text: How many people play the saxophone?

title: Answer
